tool_description: The ISBNdb database includes over 36 million unique ISBNs with up to 19 data points per book. API is only available through a paid subscription on our website, isbndb.com. If you want to explore our API, please visit isbndb.com; we offer a free 7-day trial to new subscribers.
name: Book Database
title: Book Database

api_list.name: getBookDetails

required_parameters.name: isbn
required_parameters.description: an ISBN 10 or ISBN 13 in the Books database

optional_parameters.name: with_prices
optional_parameters.description:
indicate if shows Real Time Prices. Only with the Pro plan

Available values : 1, 0

api_list.name: searchBooks
api_list.description: The query string found results in the books's database

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: a list of ISBN 10 or ISBN 13 in the Books database

optional_parameters.name: edition
optional_parameters.description: Filter books by edition

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Filter books by year of publication

optional_parameters.name: column
optional_parameters.description:
Search limited to this column:

**``** - Empty value search in every column
**title** - Only searches in Books Title
**author** - Only searches books by the given Author
**date_published** - Only searches books in a given year, e.g. 1998
**subjects** - Only searches books by the given subject, e.g. physics
Available values : , title, author, date_published, subjects

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: How many items should be returned per page, maximum of 1,000

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The number of page to retrieve, please note the API will not return more than 10,000 results no matter how you paginate them

api_list.name: searchSubjects
api_list.description: The query string found results in the subject's database

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The number of page to retrieve, please note the API will not return more than 10,000 results no matter how you paginate them

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: How many items should be returned per page, maximum of 1,000

api_list.name: getSubjectDetails
api_list.description:
The subject was found in the database
**Example Value** | Model

	
The subject was found in the database

Example Value
Model
{
  "subject": "string",
  "parent": "string"
}

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: A subject in the Subject's database

api_list.name: getStatusISBNdbDB
api_list.description: Returns a status object about the ISBNDB database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://book-database1.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-database1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://book-database1.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-database1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
